summary: The Wall Street Crash in 1929 was a big stock market crash in the United States. It started in September and got really bad on "Black Thursday" (October 24) and "Black Tuesday" (October 29). On those days, lots of people sold their shares, causing big losses. This crash is seen as a big reason for the Great Depression, a time of global economic trouble. It was the worst crash in U.S. history, with effects that lasted a long time.
title: Wall Street Crash of 1929
